title: Traxxas 5451X Assembled Driveshaft
description: Driveshaft assembly (1), left or right (fully assembled, ready to install)/ 4x15mm screw pin (1) Traxxas offers a wide variety of spring rates for the GTR shocks to precisely compensate for lighter or heavier truck configurations. The springs use high-quality spring steel with durable powder-coated finishes. Spring rate is indicated by colored dots on the end of the spring.
This is a stock replacement part for the Revo and T-Maxx 3.3. This is a plastic telescoping driveshaft with steel universals, and blue rubber boots.
